title: COVID-19 Global Education Recovery Tracker
description: Monitoring the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on response and recovery for students across the globe, by Johns Hopkins University, the World Bank, and UNICEF.

items.title: Mapping the road to recovery: How a new venture helps track learning in the wake of the pandemic
items.description: This is the first of a series of blogs and briefs highlighting key findings of the COVID Education Recovery Tracker.
